name: 語言田野調查
comment: 上課教室在雲和街大樓二樓，地址為雲和街1號(位於雲和小火鍋斜對面、Cafe a la mode正對面)，從師大側門右轉看見Starbucks右轉進入巷子步行約2分鐘(130公尺)，右手邊就會看到雲和街大樓，亦可使用Google Maps APP查詢位置。請同學使用學生證感應，進出雲和街上課教室。
description: This course provides an introduction to the principles and practice of linguistic fieldwork. Students will be trained in methods of language description and analysis based on data provided by a native speaker of an unfamiliar language. A wide range of topics will be covered, from data collection techniques to the transcription and analysis of the collected data, and all major subfields of linguistics will be involved, in particular morphology and syntax. Course is designed for students interested in documentary/descriptive linguistic work and those interested in incorporating linguistic data into research in theoretical linguistics.
